talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Master Archer Ithilien$
(Ithilien frowns as she ponders about something)
….

$Master Archer Ithilien$
How could this happen… Is this really Telesia… But….

$Master Archer Ithilien$
…Oh I'm sorry, {user_nick}. I was just thinking of something. How can I help you?

${user_nick}$
I wanted to ask you about the Black Dragon Raid. I want to know how the 6 heroes fought together after they first met.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Oh the Black Dragon Raid? Hmm...
…There is someone who can answer you better on that. I think she is around this place now.
{user_nick}, you know her too… Please go and find Lianna. She will be able to tell you much more.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Yes. She had been banished but the Elder is even thinking of asking her to come back because of her vast knowledge… She is a strong and wise Elf. She was Narcilia's aide and strategist during the Black Dragon Raid too… (Ithilien doesn't look too happy)

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Pala Telesia… I can't tell you what happened next.
…Lianna must be at Silver Crescent Training Ground now. Please go and talk to her.
(Ithilien doesn't look too happy)

${user_nick}$
(Looks like that area is not poisoned yet)

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
She seems to be deep in her thoughts lately. You may have to wait for her a while.
(Talk to Master Archer Ithilien)

${user_nick}$
(I should go there together with Iona after meeting him at the Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance.
I should go to Anu Arendel first.)

$Where Iona Used To Be$
(Iona disappeared and a small note remains instead.
The note says..."Please cometo Silver Crescent Training Ground. I met a weird Elf!"
)

${user_nick}$
(It looks like Iona is at Silver Crescent Training Ground too. Go to Silver Crescent Training Ground)

$Wandering Elf Lianna$
Hmm interesting. The Chaos Dragon! Thanks for giving me the information. I may have some progress with my research. Haha. It's worth search for the information for a few hundred years. I never expected the answers to be so near.

$White Dragon Iona$
…I'm happy that it could be of help. Erm, are you Geraint's friend? I could smell Geraint from you too… Er… Hey, {user_nick}!

$Wandering Elf Lianna$
Oh {user_nick}. I roughly heard the situation from this dragon. So you're looking for Black Dragon Raid information with him? What a smart kid. I thought people turned what happened in the past into legends and forgot about them.

$Wandering Elf Lianna$
Haha! Legends are just legends. They are not the reality. It's the story that is told and passed on.
People end up thinking that such things can't happen in their lives. As if they are a novel or something.
But... legends are surprizingly one of the stories close to our lives. There could be legends near you too.

$White Dragon Iona$
Isn't the legend what happened in the past…?????

$Wandering Elf Lianna$
…Ah… Maybe it is too difficult for a dragon who had lived from the beginning of this world. So, what shall tell you guys?
Hmm… (Lianna closes her eyes and reminisces in her thoughts for awhile)

$White Dragon Iona$
An Elf who smells of Geraint!
I may actually get to meet many of Geraint's friends when I travel around!
(Iona looks full of hope)

$Wandering Elf Lianna$
Yeah… This happened long ago. It was when the situation worsened and all the armies were pushed back until Anu Arendel.
(Lianna starts to reminisce about the past. Click the shining area behind and you can hear her memories)

*You can proceed with the quest when all the party members are at the same step of the quest.

$Warrior Barnac$
This is bad. The situation is getting out of hand. Filthy monsters! They were carrying such deadly poison….

$Geraint$
…It must be the Black Dragon's blood. They probably came to have poisonous blood after being contaminated.
I didn't think the blood would affect us so much.

$Archer Nerwin$
Many soldiers are in pain due to the poison. More than that, it is hard for us to fight without touching the blood when we fight with our weapons…(Nerwin doesn't finish her sentence)

$Royal Knight Velskud$
We must think of a plan. We are losing too many men.

$Warrior Barnac$
Hmph, can we just fight them back?

$Archer Nerwin$
Even if we come up with a plan, we can't re-deploy a soldier who has already been to the battlefield….
We can't be sure of victory with a reckless attempt to end everything in one battle. We haven't even seen the dragon yet.

$Warrior Barnac$
That what should we do?! There's nothing we can do! Argh, I wish we would have noticed it sooner….

$Geraint$
…We can look for the cure. Deciding to settle here for a while was to use the power of purification that the beautiful land of the Elves have.

$Warrior Barnac$
Research? It's easier said than done. I heard that this dragon was made by the Ancients. How… and when can we find the cure for this poison?

$Geraint$
…But we can't give up on the possibility of victory. We have to bear the time that will be taken. Giving up on the ones contaminated by the poison would be giving up on people who fought with us.

$Cleric Terramai$
I agree. It's true that the soldiers are feeling much better after we came here. The Templar Knights are doing our best too.

$Royal Knight Velskud$
…Have you never led an army before? A long war has many more things to think about than a short one. We have to consider the morale of the soldiers who keep seeing the number of injured soldiers increase.

$Geraint$
Keeping the morale high is our job. We will win. We should believe in that and act like we are going to win. They must believe firmly that we are going to win even when they are dying. That is… the only thing we can do for them.

$Royal Knight Velskud$
Let's say we are going to take time finding the cure. I don't think the monsters will be willing to wait for us quietly. Do you have a plan in mind, Geraint?

$Geraint$
Nerwin, I want to seek the wisdom of te Elves. Black Dragon is an enemy of all living things, not only humans… With the help from the Elves, the research will gain pace. I hope Terramai can leave the battlefield for the moment and concentrate on curing the injured. And Karacule...

$Geraint$
The only thing that makes us superior to the monsters is the magic concentrated with the wisdom of humans. Can you use magic to confuse them? We need to act like we have already found the [Cure]. That will stir up the enemies.

$Sorceress Karacule$
…Wow, a great idea! I don't think the monsters are smart enough to think about such plan.
(Karacule nods in agreement)

$Cleric Terramai$
Make it seem like we have already obtained what we wanted… Not a bad idea.

$Royal Knight Velskud$
Trying to fool numerous monsters only with magic that we don't even know if it will work? That kind of plan will mean death for us once it is found out by the enemies. They are going to charge at us with full force. Do you have any backup plans?

$Geraint$
…Well.(Geraint looks stern)

$Royal Knight Velskud$
…Nevermind. Shall we try it out first… (Velskud pulls out his sword) Minimize the loss of soldiers and gain as much time as possible… Sounds easy but fooling the enemies may prove to be harder than defeating them. Keep this in mind, Geraint.

$Geraint$
Of course. Any other opinions?

$Archer Nerwin$
I think Geraint has a point. My strategist Lianna and her colleagues are well versed in the ancient potions. If she leads the research, I'm sure we can find something soon.

$Sorceress Karacule$
Sounds good to me. It's time I showed the prowess of the sorceresses to the world!
Wait and see. Hahaha!

$Warrior Barnac$
Stalling for time… Though I haven't done something like that before, I should try my best. Well, I think it's a good idea, Geraint.

$Cleric Terramai$
…May the Goddess's blessings be with you.

(The discussions seems to have ended with Terramai's prayers)

$Wandering Elf Lianna$
…Isn't it a fancy story? But is our little dragon more curious about the story of fellow dragons? Ask him if he wants to hear the story of dragons. (Talk to Iona to hear the next story)

$Geraint$
(He glances at a small pieces of paper near his cape from time to time. Is that… cheat sheet?)

$Warrior Barnac$
(He keeps looking at Karacule but Karacule keeps looking at Geraint)

$Cleric Terramai$
(He is meddling with his wand. It somehow looks much heavier than other ordinary wands)

$Sorceress Karacule$
(She keeps looking at Geraint but he doesn't seem to notice)

$Archer Nerwin$
(She is standing in an elegant manner)

$Royal Knight Velskud$
(Staring at Geraint with his face full of discontent)

$White Dragon Iona$
The story of which dragon? Geraint?

(You cannot listen to the story of heroes anymore in the current journal if you proceed with the quest)

$Wandering Elf Lianna$
Is there any other dragon in this story? Of course it's about Geraint.
These two kept on talking even when the others went back to their positions.

$Wandering Elf Lianna$
Think of me as godsent, {user_nick}. Haha. You can't find ths in any of the books.

*Click the shining area if you want to listen to the remaining story.

$Geraint$
Velskud, you have something to tell me in private? That is unlikely of you. What is the matter?

$Royal Knight Velskud$
Everyone agreed to your plan. I also don't think that it is a wrong step to take, but…

$Geraint$
What are you trying to say?

$Royal Knight Velskud$
You tend to be too caring for those under you. A general must be heartless. It is the role of the leader to gain victory. Worrying about the lives of your lackeys should come after that.

$Geraint$
I…

$Royal Knight Velskud$
I know. You're not someone suitable to lead this army… When everything ends, the monsters hungry for power are going to aim for you. When it all ends, I will help you to go to where you want to go.

$Geraint$
I'm fine. I will take my matters into my own hands.

$Royal Knight Velskud$
Are you confident about winning those pigs who are blinded by their stature and engage in a fight where no one wins? You are a human but… you don't know about humans. You are an easy prey for them.

$Geraint$
(Geraint's face stiffens)

$Royal Knight Velskud$
It's easy for me to sneak you out given my position. I will help your friend in the red hood too.
What was her name… Argenta?

$Geraint$
Why are you trying to help me?

$Royal Knight Velskud$
Because you are…

$Royal Knight Velskud$
A really good comrade that I haven't come across in a long time.
(Velskud smiles bitterly)

$Geraint$
(You can't read Geraint's expression… No more of the conversation can be heard)


(You cannot listen to the story of heroes anymore in the current journal if you proceed with the quest)

$Royal Knight Velskud$
…But why did you come to my tent yesterday?
My books were all over the place.

$Geraint$
I couldn't really remember one word so I went to take a look at your books.
I put the books back where they were.

$Royal Knight Velskud$
…Where they were…? Phew, you call that putting them back where they were?
You can't possibly say you've put them back in the right place if you look at the order and shape of the books.

$Geraint$
I put them in the bookshelf.

$Royal Knight Velskud$
Yeah, I meant put them back in their places in the bookshelf.
Jeez, you don't even know how to arrange books properly. Weren't their any books in the countryside?

$Geraint$
I didn't have time to look for those things. There are always more important things to do.

$Royal Knight Velskud$
…Didn't even have time to read a book? What kind of a countryside did you come from?
(Velskud asks irritatedly, but Geraint only shakes his head… No more of the conversation can be heard)

$Geraint$
(Geraint pulls the cheat sheet off his cape)
It's something I learnt yesterday, and it was really useful. Humans are smart indeed.
Terramai always teaches me useful things.

$Royal Knight Velskud$
(Velskud frowns like he has had enough) Terramai again? He has never done anything other than treating the injured soldiers. The Goddess would be hopping mad if she finds out…

$Geraint$
The Goddess may be happy instead.

$Royal Knight Velskud$
Are you serious? Keke… That would make the clerics hopping mad.
(Velskud smiles slightly)

$Geraint$
Why are they all hopping? Isn't that something to be happy about?
(Looks like he doesn't understand what Velskud is saying)

$Royal Knight Velskud$
I will send enough books to fill your little town in the future. You should at least learn about the basic clerics' doctrine!
There are many things in this world that you should learn other than swordsmanship. Especially so if you are a human. (Velskud gives a distorted smile)

$Geraint$
Hmm…? Okay. I will get it from you later.
(Looks like Geraint didn't understand the sarcasm...)

$Wandering Elf Lianna$
Those fools. Men are basically fools.
Actually I was a fool too for being with those fools.
(Lianna giggles)

$Wandering Elf Lianna$
…Well that's it.
That's all I can tell you. I don't have anything else to remember.
So how did you find my story, Dragon? Did you find it satisfactory?
(Talk to Iona)

$White Dragon Iona$
Er… Hmm...
It's a little different from what I expected, but everyone is so cool.
Geraint really collaborated with the humans.
He doesn't seem like a dragon at all.

$Wandering Elf Lianna$
Haha, anyway {user_nick}, are you looking for these information because of the Red Dragon who is said to have appeared near this area recently? But the situation has changed much compared to the past. I don't know if what I told you can be helpful.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The situation may be different, but I feel that everyone needs to work together.</html>
<html>The humans, Elves, and whoever else need to join forces together.</html>
<html>Warriors, Archers, Sorceresses, and Clerics all have the same goal.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Wandering Elf Lianna$
Now, the group of mercenaries that used to be the center of the Warriors is gone. Leader of Fairystar had been changed not long ago. Terramai must be feeling the limitations of leading the clerics with his old ageing body. The Royal Castle is busy fighting the monsters, and to your suprise, you will find all the healthy knights somewhere else.

$White Dragon Iona$
…{user_nick}!!!!
(He looks really suprised)

$Wandering Elf Lianna$
What? Hahahaha! You are so amazingly cute. But that's the right answer. Two potions are better than one! Of course! My cute little dragon, if you listen to {user_nick} and behave well, it won't end up like what happened in the past.

$White Dragon Iona$
Did something happen?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Is she saying that when she knows everything already?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Wandering Elf Lianna$
Oh you don't know? It happened at the end of the Raid. You should ask the person who experienced it firsthand. Terramai is still at the Saint Haven Royal Castle. (Lianna has a queer smile on her face)

$White Dragon Iona$
H-huh? The Royal Castle? Then it's obvious that I can't go….
(Iona shivers)
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Wandering Elf Lianna$
Huh, why?

$Wandering Elf Lianna$
Why is everyone like fools. Actually, only fools can do this kind of thing.
Haha. Are you a fool or an evil fool?
(You can take the quest again when you talk to Iona)

journal.title: Efforts for Legend 1
journal.contents:
Stas said Ithilien would be a better candidate to tell you about the Black Dragon Raid.
Look for Master Archer Ithilien.

Saint Haven - Master Archer Ithilien
journal.destination: Talk to Saint Haven's Master Archer Ithilien

journal.title: Efforts for Legend 2
journal.contents:
Ithilien said that Wandering Elf Lianna would know more about her since she's older.
Take Iona to meet Lianna.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - White Dragon Iona
journal.destination: Talk to Iona at Anu Arendel
journal.todo_msg: Look for Iona at Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance.

journal.title: Efforts for Legend 3
journal.contents:
Iona is already at Silver Crescent Training Ground.
Follow him.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - Silver Crescent Training Ground (Wandering Elf Lianna)
journal.destination: Talk to Lianna at Silver Crescent Training Ground.
journal.todo_msg: Go to Silver Crescent Training Ground.

journal.title: Efforts for Legend 4
journal.contents:
Wandering Elf Lianna starts talking about the past.
Listen to her story.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - Silver Crescent Training Ground (Where the 6 heroes gathered)
journal.destination: Talk to Lianna and listen to the story of the past
journal.todo_msg: The story of the past has begun. Please listen to the story.

journal.title: Efforts for Legend 5
journal.contents:
You have heard the story about the Six Heroes.
Talk to Iona and listen to the next story.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - Silver Crescent Training Ground (Where the 6 heroes gathered)
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Iona and listen to the next story.

journal.title: Efforts for Legend 6
journal.contents:
Lianna says she has more things to tell you about.
Listen to the next story.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - Silver Crescent Training Ground (Where the 6 heroes gathered)
journal.destination: Listen to Geraint and Velskud's story
journal.todo_msg: Listen to Geraint and Velskud's story.

journal.title: Efforts for Legend 7
journal.contents:
You have finished listening to the story.
Talk to Iona who had been listening to the story with eyes wide open with suprise.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Shady Blue Moon Entrance) - Silver Crescent Training Ground (White Dragon Iona)
journal.todo_msg: The story has ended. Talk to Iona.
